definition: 動力，勢頭；物理學中的動量
example: The team gained momentum after winning their first game.
She is remarkably resilient in the face of adversity.
Success comes through perseverance and hard work.
This is a worthwhile endeavor that will benefit many people.
The book had a profound impact on my thinking.
This restaurant serves authentic Italian cuisine.
The company is known for its innovative approach to problem-solving.
Scientists from different countries collaborate on this research project.

definition: 可持續的，能長期維持的
example: We need to find sustainable solutions to environmental problems.
Education empowers people to make better decisions.
